rukus.text: geu gos-eneun yes seonjodeuldo manh-eu myeo
huse-ui salamdeuldo manh-i issnola
jwapyeon-ui donglyoga issnani neohuineunjwapyeon-ui donglyoga mueos-inji aneunyo
geudeul-eun jag-yeolhaneun boljioggwa deulkkeulhneun mulsog-e issge doego
geom-eun yeongi sog-e issge doeni
siwonhan geosdo jeulgil su eobsnola
ineun geudeul-i ijeon-e jaemulgwa sachie tamnighayeo
keuge saaghago omanhayeoss-eumyeo
jug-eo heulg-idoeeo ppyeoman namneun u liga dasi buhwalhandan mal-inyo lago malhayeossdeola
uli seonjodeuldo geuleohdan mal-i yo lago malhaessdeola
illeogalodoe geuleohanila yes seonjodeuldo geuligo huse-ui salamdeuldo
moduga jal allyeojin eotteon nal sangbong-eul wihayeo dagat-i moini
banghwanghago geojishaessdeon jadeul-iyeo
neohuineun jakkumnamuleul masboli la
geuttae neohui baedeul-eun geugeos-eulo bupul-eo oleugo
geu wilo deulkkeulhneun mul-eul masimae
galjeung-e heodeog-ineun nagtaga ma sineun geosgwa gatdeola
geuleoham-i geudeul-i bad-eul bosang ui nal daejeob-ila
hananim-i neohuileul changjohayeoss-eu doe neohuineun geu jinlileul mid-eulyeo haji anhneunyo
neohuineun ingan-ui jeong-aeg-eul saeng-gaghae boassneunyo
geugeos-eun neohuiga changjohan geos-inyoanimyeon hananim-i changjohan geos-inyo
hananim-eun neohui gaunde nugu egelado jug-eum-eul ileuge hal su iss eudoe jwajeolhaji anihamyeo
neohuiui yangsang-eul bakkueo neohui ga alji moshaneun yangsang-eulo neohuileul jaechangjo hasinila
neohuineun choechoui changjoleul algo iss-eumyeonseo geugeos-eul gyohun-eulo samji anhneunyo
neohuiga ttang-e simneun ssias-eul bo ji ani haessneunyo
neohuiga geugeos-eul jalage haneu nyo animyeon hananim-i seongjangke haneu nyo
hananim-i wonhandamyeon geubun-eun geugeos-eul sansanjogag-eulo mandeusinila geuttae neohuineun bitan-e ppajimyeo
sillo jeohuineun buchaeman-eul jige doeeoss-eumyeo
modeun geos-i heosdoeeossdoda lago malhal geos-ila
neohuineun neohuiga masineun mul-eul saeng-gaghayeo boassneunyo
neohuiga bileul naelige haneunyo animyeon hananim-i bileul naelige ha neunyo
hananim-i wonhaessdamyeon geubun-eun geugeos-eul jjage hasyeoss-eulila geulaedo neohuineun gamsahalyeo haji anhneunyo
neohuiga kin bul-eul saeng-gaghayeo boassneunyo
bul-eul kyeogiwihae namuleul sim-eun jaga neohuiinyo animyeon hananim-i geugeos-eul seongjangke haneunyo
hananim-eun geugeos-eulo gyohun-i doege hayeossgo yeohaengjadeul-ege yuyong hadolog hayeossnola
geuleomeulo widaehan geudae junim ui ileum-eulo chanmihala
